theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Remodeling-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SAHF formation and chromatin changes driving senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Remodeling-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chromatin fiber density and spacing changes linked to senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Remodeling-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Involves MORF4/MRG family genes regulating chromatin remodeling and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Remodeling-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: MORF4 and MRG genes modulate chromatin state to induce senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Remodeling-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Anti-oncogenes like RB regulate cell cycle arrest via chromatin and epigenetic changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Cell Cycle Arrest Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes replicative senescence as terminal postmitotic state and its markers.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Cell Cycle Arrest Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on replicative senescence, generation time changes, and cell cycle dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Cell Cycle Arrest Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on Hayflick limit and cellular senescence as a biological clock.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Cell Cycle Arrest Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses replicative and stress-induced senescence including neuronal senescence-like states.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Cell Cycle Arrest Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p21WAF1 and pRb phosphorylation regulating senescence versus apoptosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Epigenetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: miR-194 targets DNMT3A affecting DNA methylation and inducing senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Epigenetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: p53 pathway genetic variants modulate stress response and influence aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Epigenetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: p53 pro-oxidant activity links DNA damage response and neuronal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Epigenetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: NFκB dynamics induce epigenetic changes driving inflammatory senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Epigenetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: NF-κB signaling mediates systemic aging via senescence and SASP regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy-Mediated Cellular Senescence Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Autophagy controls protein quality and SASP production during senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy-Mediated Cellular Senescence Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: ApoJ upregulation in senescence links stress response, chaperone activity, and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes feedback loop between oxidative stress and senescent cell phenotype.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: ELN regulates mitochondrial function affecting oxidative stress and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage Repair-Enhanced Cellular Senescence Delay Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: cGAS-mediated enhanced homologous recombination repair delays senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Immune Clearance Impairment Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Loss of Y chromosome impairs immune clearance of senescent cells causing accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Immune Clearance Impairment Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Immune surveillance normally clears senescent cells; failure leads to accumulation and disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Immune Clearance Impairment Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Microglial senescence impairs immune function contributing to neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Sterile Immune Activation and Metabolic Dysfunction in Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: IRF7-driven sterile immune activation impairs metabolism in aging stromal cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear Partitioning and Cellular Immortality-Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Partitioning of immortality in nuclear components explains senescence and longevity.
